name: Droga Wojownika
overview: Droga Wojownika (Way of the Warrior) is an arcade action game. The main character is a barbarian called Telven. His task is to find all the Seals. The barbarian encounters on his way goblins, trolls and other creatures. After killing a monster and returning to the same chamber, the dead enemy comes back to life as a skeleton. The barbarian can use four different sword attacks and parry the opponent's attacks.
